title: Select a General Contractor
description: A developer needs to select a General Contractor (GC) for a new construction project.

tasks.description: Prepare a bid package with the project's architectural and engineering plans.
tasks.expected_outcome: A complete bid package is assembled.

tasks.description: Send the bid package to a pre-qualified list of at least three GCs and set a bid deadline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Multiple GCs are invited to bid on the project.

tasks.description: Analyze the received bids, comparing not just price but also the GC's experience, timeline, and qualifications, and recommend a GC to ownership.
tasks.expected_outcome: A GC is selected based on a thorough analysis.
